blocks.title: At SMX Advanced
blocks.description: Gus, Frank & Hayden attended the SMX Advanced conference in Seattle this June, where the latest tips and best practices for search marketing & SEO are covered.

blocks.title: Warriors Win It
blocks.description: Our team had a blast watching the Golden State Warriors win the NBA Championship. Congrats to the Dubs!

blocks.title: Supporting CALIcon
blocks.description: Justia sponsored and attended CALIcon17, held at the Sandra Day O'Connor College of Law at Arizona State University. The conference brought together leading academics, educators, institutional leaders, and technology professionals to discuss the transformation of legal education through technology and innovation.
